segments.text: I'm just watching this woman, completely absorbed in her dish-drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so focused on that one plate, polishing it with such care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the entire sink is overflowing right in front of her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is cascading down the cabinet fronts and spreading across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, and she acts as if it's perfectly normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me so incredibly frustrated to see such a clear oversight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The continuous sheet of water is quite mesmerizing in its own way, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can already imagine the water damage expanding under the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's going to step back at some point and be utterly shocked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a ticking time bomb of domestic inconvenience and expense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm exterior of the garden outside provides such a bizarre contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can one be so utterly detached from their immediate surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR
